channel.title: Need help with ::update command

item.title: Need help with ::update command
item.dc:creator: @avirunes avirunes
item.description:
@avirunes wrote:

The update command from my source doesn’t work and i need help fixing it :S, have had a guy helping me code so he might have changed it from the original a bit, it didnt use to work at all, but now when i type ::update 30, in 30seconds it will just repeatidly kick me until i turned server off, and doesn’t announce that theirs an update in 30secs

{if(c.playerRights == 3) { if (playerCommand.startsWith("update") && c.playerRights == 3) { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); int a = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = a; PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = true; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); } }

all help will be greatly appreciated. Thanks

Read full topic
